name: Rolling Smash Strike
description:
Begin the endless journey through the multiple dimensions, move in smooth way with beautiful musics and sounds by destroying all the hurdles in the path in the Rolling Smash Strike : Hit Pyramids With Ball Game. With great focus, concentration and perfect timing travel as far as you could and break beautiful glass objects in different shapes and colours during your journey in Smash Up game.

Experience one of the great glass destruction physics in the Rolling Smash Strike by smashing the glass objects with the ball throw while moving ahead breaking all the hurdles in your way. Travel as far as you could to make the highest scores record and making it challenging for others to break it.

Game Features:

- 3D Beautiful Coloured Glass Models
- Infinite Gameplay
- Stunning game graphics and multiple environments for glass smashing
- Realistic Glass Breaking Effects and Physics
- Attractive glass smashing sounds and music
